CHAT.comment: The mood is comfortable for this activity. EXP and EX2 remain in the background and do not participate in the discussion between Mot and Chi. Mot does the vast majority of the talking; Chi's longest utterance is about six words and most of his utterances are one to three word answers to questions which were posed by Mot. Mot spends a good deal of time talking to Chi about the scientific ideas behind magnetism , reminding him that they had read something about it previously. Unfortunately , MOT doesn't remember the general idea , that opposites attract and like poles repel , and it's hard to tell if Chi knows this since he doesn't verbalize it clearly. The final part of the activity is spent building a structure

u.a: talks more about the money
<$=30> EXP and EX2 whisper to one another; at points their conversation overpowers Mot and Chi's
puts black base down on table
places nickel on black base
picks up black base and shakes it; causing nickel to slide back and forth across its surface
points to a corner of the black base
points to opposite corner of black base
puts nickel down on base; tilts base to one side; nickel slides across it and falls off
picks up black base and turns it over
puts nickel on black base
the coin falls off the black base
clears off silver circle and moves it across table; picks up yellow wand and begins to pull magnets off it
tilts black base back and forth; there is a nut on it that the Chi has placed there
picks up silver stick and hands it to Chi
waves yellow wand over black base
hands yellow wand to Chi
waves yellow wand over black base; brings it close and wand sticks to base
indicates one side of the base with the wand
moves the yellow wand to the other side of the black base; it sticks
continues to stick wand to black base and pull it off
grabs Chi's head and moves it up and down with hands
taps Chi on head
holds up yellow wand and points it toward the black base
indicates the other objects on the table with the yellow wand
puts silver circle on black base; places two silver men in standing positions on silver circle
taps the top of the black base with the yellow wand
taps the side of the black base with the yellow wand
places another silver man on the black base
places a fourth silver man on the black base
reaches over and pulls black base away from Chi toward her
attempts to finish arranging silver men on black base
moves yellow wand toward black base

g.ga: the top of the black base

u.a: points to the top and side of the black base with the yellow wand as she refers to them in her speech
taps top of black base
taps yellow wand
taps yellow wand
taps side of black base
taps yellow wand
moves yellow wand over top of black base
takes yellow wand out of Mot's hands
moves hands toward one another and then away before they touch
uses yellow wand to indicate black base
holds up yellow wand; moves it toward top of black base until the two stick together
moves yellow wand from the top of the black base to the side of it
holds yellow wand above black base
holds hand out toward base
moves yellow wand toward side of black base; black base slides across the table away from the wand
grabs Chi's hand on wand and moves wand over the top of the base
resumes action of using yellow wand to push base across the table
moves yellow wand to top of black base and picks it up
pulls black base off of yellow wand and attempts to put a washer on the side of it
takes black base from Mot's hands
is attempting to stick washers to side of black base
picks up silver circle
puts silver circle on black base
picks up several pieces and moves them towards the base
waves hands
picks up several nuts
shakes head
places a small construction of nuts and magnet balls on the black base
shakes hand over black base
holds up a silver man
picks up yellow wand and holds it near black platform
points to yellow wand
grabs silver man and attempts to attach it to the under side of the yellow wand above the black base
takes silver man from Mot and puts it on the black base
pulls silver man off black base
holds yellow wand at a slight distance from the silver man that Chi is holding
yellow wand has just pulled silver man toward it
takes yellow wand from Mot; holds it over silver man on black base; the whole base sticks to the yellow wand
turns yellow wand over and tries to move silver man with it
points to black base
tries both sides of yellow wand on black base
points to the sides of the yellow wand
moves one side of the yellow wand down toward the black base; it pushes away; then flips the wand and tries the other side; it sticks and pulls the silver man who had been on the black base to it
a silver stick , or something similar to that , falls onto the floor; Chi uses yellow wand to pick it up
clears yellow wand of all the magnets that have become stuck to it
takes yellow wand and moves it over a coin on the table
places coins on black base; then tips base so they all slide off
picks up black base and holds it above coins; coins don't move , but the large silver circle slides across the table and sticks to it
begins to stack silver men one on top of another on the platform
